mapper.select: select count(*) from TB_NOTICE where status='Y'

SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_MODIFY_DATE, N.STATUS, NOTICE_READCNT, FILE_NAME, FRENAME, N.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM TB_NOTICE N JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON (N.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE N.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC
mapper.insert: insert into tb_Notice values(SEQ_NOTICENO.NEXTVAL, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, default, #{noticeModifyDate}, default, default, #{fileName}, #{fRename}, #{memberNo} )
mapper.update: update tb_Notice set NOTICE_READCNT=NOTICE_READCNT+1 where notice_no=#{nno} and status='Y'
mapper.select: select * from tb_Notice where notice_no=#{nno} and status='Y'
SELECT NN.NOTICE_NO, NN.NOTICE_TITLE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE FROM TB_NOTICE N WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY N.NOTICE_NO DESC) NN WHERE ROWNUM <= 3
